name: Nessimpostor (Maccam)
description:
Take the place of Nessy (Nessie). The world famous monster of the lake Loch Ness in Scotland.

You are not really Nessy. Not at all.

But you love to scare people that come here to see the Monster. Scare them like a real monster!

But stay away from the Police! They will catch you!

You can rate this game for the Ludum Dare 33 and tell us what you think about it here: Ludum Dare 33 Link

Credits:

Camille Gangneux (Maccam) - Game Art

Nathan Grange - Programming
